rule.name: restrict_part_definition_category

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF( QUERY( pd <* part_definitions | (SIZEOF( QUERY( prpc <* USEDIN(pd.formation.of_product, 'PRODUCT_DEFINITION_SCHEMA.PRODUCT_RELATED_PRODUCT_CATEGORY.PRODUCTS') | prpc.name IN ['part','raw material','tool'] )) = 0 ) )) = 0
